name: Scream
description:
Within an environment of collapsed or failing states, poverty and violence prevail. 
In such a situation not only do women suffer more painful conditions, they actually perceive pain more intensely than men do. While they have the responsibility to hold families and communities together, their pain and trauma are generally overlooked. 
For women beyond all the primary daily needs, there are few opportunities to seek justice. They are victimized in many ways. First, by the offense, then after the crime with no right to talk or have psychological assistance and in some cases, by carrying the shame for loss of dignity.
